0: While you change the interactivity , all the monitoring will be stopped to avoid unwanted updation in interactivity-config.
1: Your application remembers your settings for e.g. checkboxes values , interactivity paths.
2: You need to refresh by pressing 'Refresh' button in the overview tab to bring the changes on the interactivity edited manually.
3: You can search messages , cut , copy and paste elements , screens , messages using Loc-acc Tab functions.
